members.signatureBeforeChange: public void setImage (int index, Image image)
members.signatureAfterChange: public void setImage (int index, Image image)
diff: -	* Bug in GTK.  When using fixed-height-mode,
-	* row changes do not cause the row to be repainted.  The fix is to
-	* invalidate the row when it is cleared.

members.signatureBeforeChange: public void setText (int index, String string)
members.signatureAfterChange: public void setText (int index, String string)
diff: -	* Bug in GTK.  When using fixed-height-mode,
-	* row changes do not cause the row to be repainted.  The fix is to
-	* invalidate the row when the text changes.
